section.name: Navigating Content
section.p: Hippo Repository is a fully jsr-170 compliant repository built on top of Apache Jackrabbit. The content in Hippo Repository has some hierarchical structure (=Jackrabbit), which you can browse with any JCR browser (or with any WebDAV client in the future, see roadmap). Hippo CMS/DMS is an example of such a browser.

Browsing the content as it is stored hierarchically is out-of-the-box Jackrabbit functionality. Hippo Repository adds to this physical hierachical structure as many views you want to add, exposing all these views jsr-170 compliant! Facetted navigation is an example of out-of-the-box view on the physical data.
